name: Camellia
review: Ordered a fairing kit for my 2001Ducati 748, when it arrived it was a lighter yellow that what it looked like on the photos sent. No where exact to true Ducati yellow.

name: Vasqueze
review: You were unable to give me an expected receive date, Why? Very disappointed. Are we looking at 2 days or 6 weeks? My side by side is tore apart and not able to use, do I put the old, bad belt back in and put it together (lot of work), or wait... tell me it ships right away, I'll change my rating as well as look to purchase again, thanks

name: Dr. Curry
review: The entire process was seamless and professional. Very efficient communication, any questions- Erick got right back to me. The process is long but everything was as described right from the beginning (just seems like forever when you're anxious).

name: Isaac
review: Highly recommend you guys, products are awesome with super fast delivery to the east coast, ordered Monday and received Thursday, very happy. Thanks guys, cheers John

name: Adam
review: Perfect fit and shipped quick! Needed to upgraded both front axels on my 2008 artic cat 650. Was referred by a friend to try these out

name: Waldman
review: Janese provides such excellent customer service. Her communication is clear, concise and she replies very quickly. Parts are dispatched upon purchase the same if not very next day and they come package really really well, to reduce any form of damage from being miss handled by couriers.
